The fryer, or, An historical treatise wherein the idle lives, vitiousness, malice, folly, and cruelty of the fryers is described : in two parts, tragical and comical : collected out of sundry authors, and several languages, and caused to be translated into English / by James Salgado ... Salgado, James, fl. 1680.
2 v.
Printed for the author, London : 1680.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries. Imperfect: beginning pages partially mutilated.
